title: Mine Sweeper
description: A react based mine sweeper game using an API. This was from my first week of learning React at SDG. API can be slow at times, and have not set up for mobile use yet.

title: Black Jack
description: A JavaScript based Black Jack game. This was the culmination of my first week of learning JavaScript at SDG. Set up the CSS for mobile use, but looks great on large screens as well.

title: My Color Chart
description: My first project with React. The purpose of this project was an introduction to state and props, as well as to see React renders the colors as the sliders moves.

title: Tic Tac Toe
description: A JavaScript based tic tac toe game. This was a group project from the second week of JavaScript as SDG. Worked on the project's logic with Allan Seitz, but CSS was all me.

title: Score Board
description: My first project with JavaScript at SDG. Learned about JavaScript basics like event listener, query selectors, and functions.

title: My Portfolio
description: I started to build this site as I completed the front-end portion of my time at SDG. I used React JS, React Router, Styled Components, and much more to build this site.
